item.title: The Chernobyl Disaster Imagined by Artificial Intelligence
item.description: I instructed ChatGPT how to create prompts for text to image generation using stable diffusion machine learning models, fed the prompts into InvokeAI to generate images and compiled them in this book.

item.title: Convert Web Pages to Ebooks in MOBI Format using Wget and Calibre
item.description: Learn how to convert web pages to Mobi format for easy reading on your Kindle or other e-readers. Follow this simple guide and enjoy your favorite articles on-the-go!

item.title: Unlock the Power of ImageMagick: A Beginner's Guide to Image Processing
item.description: ImageMagick is a powerful open-source tool for image processing. This tutorial covers the basic commands for image conversion, resizing, cropping, rotating, and adding effects. Learn how to manipulate your images with this tutorial.

item.title: Python Number Formatting Made Easy with f-Strings
item.description: Learn how to format numbers in Python with f-strings. Use format_spec to specify width, alignment, scientific notation, and more.

item.title: AI Ethics, Advancements, and Limitations: An Interview with ChatGPT
item.description: An interview with ChatGPT, I conducted on March 30th 2023, asking about GPT, creating language models, artificial and human intelligence, potential benefits and risks of AI, ethical considerations, and predictions for the future.

item.title: Stable Diffusion Sampler and CFG Scale Parameter Comparison
item.description: Compare the influence of different samplers and CFG values when generating images with Stable Diffusion machine learning models.

item.title: Prompt Engineer I Talk to Machines AI/ML Geek & Nerd Design
item.description: Prompt engineering is a hot topic and job in the rapidly growing technology fields of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). Show that you know how to talk to machines and are a pro at crafting effictive prompts for content generation.

item.description: Prompt engineering is a hot topic and job in the rapidly growing technology fields of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML). Show that you know how to talk to machines and are a pro at crafting effictive prompts for content generation.
